EXPLANATION OF FIGURES. 

neph. o nephridial opening. 

n. f nerve liber. 

n. f. 1 nephridial funnel into rec- 
 tal body cavity. 

n. f. 2 nephridial funnel into lat- 
 eral body cavity. 

n. p nephridial pit.

perianal ring.
